title: India 's petroleum imports by value 2010 to 2019

summary: In 2010 , FY_2019 was the India Years brand in terms of Years value .

gold: India imported petroleum products worth over 9.8 trillion Indian rupees in fiscal year 2019.
Petroleum made up a share of over 27 percent of all imports into the country that year.
The increasing trend in recent years was reflected in the price of fuel and its impact on various industries across the south Asian country .
